Class ActorPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ActorPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
 class ActorPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

ActorPanel class. Extends the JPanel component to make an AWT component that draws Actors.

Author:
(Nikolaj Ignatieff Schwartzbach).

Constructor Detail

ActorPanel

public ActorPanel(int width,
                  int height)
           throws java.io.IOException
Create a new ActorPanel. An ActorPanel draws the Actors (turtles), which have been added to this ActorPanel.

Parameters:
width - The width in pixels of this ActorPanel.
height - The height in pixels of this ActorPanel.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

public void addActor(Actor a)
Adds an Actor to this ActorPanel.

Parameters:
a - The Actor object.

clear

public void clear()
Clears the content of this ActorPanel (removes all lines the Actors have drawn).

clearGrid

public void clearGrid()
Clears the grid of this ActorPanel (that is, removes it).

drawGrid

public void drawGrid(int i)
Draws a grid with grid spacing i.

Parameters:
i - The spacing (in pixels) between grid lines.

drawLine

public void drawLine(int x1,
                     int y1,
                     int x2,
                     int y2,
                     java.awt.Color col)
Draws a line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) using col as Color.

Parameters:
x1 - The first x-coordinate.
y1 - The first y-coordinate.
x2 - The second x-coordinate.
y2 - The second y-coordinate.
col - The Color to use.
